welcome_message_body: Welcome to Sanliurfa, the "City of Prophets" and home to breathtaking historical sites, vibrant bazaars, and delicious cuisine. We invite you to immerse yourself in the rich culture and warm hospitality of our city and explore all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Guney Anadolu Projesi Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Guney Anadolu Projesi Airport, handling all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi access is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sanliurfa Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Sanliurfa Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
